channel.title: Error Compiling Server
channel.description:
So I've recently wanted to just walk around on my own server for fun, but for some reason I can't even get it compiled properly.
I downloaded this source + client : [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,664755.0.html]Source+Client Thread[/url]
And this is the error I get when I compile : [url=http://i.imgur.com/un1q4eY.png]Compile Error[/url] and so on...
Please help me, every time I try to get a server up I run into some kind of trouble and it's probably because one mistake in my java or environmental variables, I don't even know but I'd like to solve this :)
If you need any more information please ask me ! Thanks for your help in advance !
EDIT : I also get a message like this when I try to open any .java file with java: [url=http://i.imgur.com/h641ouW.png]Opening .java file error[/url]

item.title: Error Compiling Server
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Empty Mr Empty
item.description:
@Mr_Empty wrote:

Awesome this fixes it. Thank you very much

Read full topic

item.title: Error Compiling Server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Mr Empty, post:4, topic:553772”]Allright if this was the only problem it would be no problem, but I also have problems with logging on.
I’m probably doing random things but as I said this is just for fun and for learning. Again, I haven’t actually touched ANYTHING on the server yet and that might be the problem

This is what I get when I try to log on the server.

After this screen I disconnect from the server.

P.S.: nvm the java problem.[/quote]
The error you’re getting is because it’s attempting to connect to a MySQL database, which you can’t connect to.

Go back to the source thread
and try downloading the one that’s in a quote at the bottom of the first post. It’s big and red, you can’t miss it.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Compiling Server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“loliateyourcat, post:2, topic:553772”]Hello, I have not done much with a 317, but from my experience dealing with 718+ I believe the compile “error” doesn’t look like an error. They are warnings. Are you compiling the client or the server? For 718 when you compile the client the warnings are normal, I have 10 that I have been working on.

As for trying to open up the .java file, what program are you trying to use to open it? Notepad ++? Or are you trying to run it?[/quote]
Warnings are normal for both the client and server for a typical 317 PI. Plus, revision doesn’t matter here. Literally any java program can have warnings at any given moment, it’s all about the previous owner.

As for this server in specific:
All the warnings you’re seeing are from the Control Panel that was released ages ago by Robgob (This one right here). And the code for it is just terrible.

Here’s your solutions, honestly:

  1. Ignore the warnings. They’re not exactly bad, but they’re not good either. Most of the warnings are due to the shit code.

  2. Rewrite the control panel. If you write the control panel over, and properly, there won’t be a single warning for it. However, your server will still have other warnings from other files.

  3. Remove the control panel. What easier way to fix a problem than removing it’s source You’ll have to do the tutorial I linked above in reverse, basically.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Compiling Server
item.dc:creator: @loliateyourcat loliateyourcat
item.description:
@loliateyourcat wrote:

Hello, I have not done much with a 317, but from my experience dealing with 718+ I believe the compile “error” doesn’t look like an error. They are warnings. Are you compiling the client or the server? For 718 when you compile the client the warnings are normal, I have 10 that I have been working on.

As for trying to open up the .java file, what program are you trying to use to open it? Notepad ++? Or are you trying to run it?

Read full topic
